law.history: Repealed 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 77, sec. 24, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 201, effective June 16, 1966. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 595, 613.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Double liability for certain stock issued prior to May 16, 1936.
